history.narrative: Law 2-70, the “Pesticide Operations Act of 1977,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-180. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 8, 1977, and November 22, 1977, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 3, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-145 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 2-70 became effective on April 18, 1978.
